<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eternal Blessing](/Feats.aspx?ID=303) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 126 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
good alignment

</column>

---

Your good deeds have brought your deity’s grace to you for all of eternity. You’re continuously surrounded by a [_bless_](/Spells.aspx?ID=25) spell with a spell level equal to half your level (rounded up). The radius is 15 feet, and you can’t increase it. You can Dismiss the spell; if you do, it returns automatically after 1 minute.
name: Eternal Blessing
